mapper.update: update t_wms_provider set GMTCREATE = #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, GMTMODIFIED = #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ISDELETED = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NAMECREATE = #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAMEMODIFIED = #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROVIDERNAME = #{providername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROVIDERCONTACT = #{providercontact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROVIDERTEL = #{providertel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROVIDEREMAIL = #{provideremail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROVIDERADDR = #{provideraddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROVIDERNO = #{providerno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, PROVIDERNAME, PROVIDERCONTACT, PROVIDERTEL, PROVIDEREMAIL, PROVIDERADDR, PROVIDERNO from t_wms_provider where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, PROVIDERNAME, PROVIDERCONTACT, PROVIDERTEL, PROVIDEREMAIL, PROVIDERADDR, PROVIDERNO from t_wms_provider
